Descriptioin

Snap is a short film by a team of 4 that narrates a myterious story of a very special vintage camera. The film was created using DSLRs and basic lighting equitment as well as dedicated sound recorder. The story starts with this vintage film camera purchased by a curious man. The video was awarded second place in the SFU SIAT Showcase 2012 under "Moving Images" category.
